## map() function

Creates a Parser that applies the given function to each value generated by the given parser.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function map<T, U, Input = string>(parser: Parser<T, Input>, map: (v: T) => U): Parser<U, Input>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parser | [Parser](./prsc.parser.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, Input&gt; | Parser to map over |
|  map | (v: T) =&gt; U | Function to transform values generated by parser |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Parser](./prsc.parser.md)<!-- -->&lt;U, Input&gt;
